messages.message:
Hello {1},
We are just a few days away from our wedding! So we would like to give you some practical information.
If you want to join the ceremony in the morning, you can park ... For the evening party, you can park ...
After the evening reception, you can find a seat at {2}.
You can find this information and the time scheme at https://raf-en-vero.pauwels-cordier.be/?uuid={3}
Thank you for joining us, and see you soon!
Kind regards,
VÃ©ronique and Raf

message.p: We are just a few days away from our wedding! So we would like to give you some practical information.
If you want to join the ceremony in the morning, you can park ... For the evening party, you can park ...
After the evening reception, you can find a seat at {2}.
